overview: What happens to a world famous model who finds herself the object of an unknown man's obsession? For one, it can be very frightening. For another, it can be very exciting and different. The story unfolds with unexpected events its the obsessive blue collar worker stops at nothing in his pursuit of the beautiful creature that haunts his very existence. The erotic intrigue builds from the outset until it explodes at the climatic end.
tagline: In the game of high stakes modeling, the bottom line is measures only if you are...
title: Sittin' Pretty
